text:
Why the DOM Paser and SAX Parser can not suppot encoding GBK in Xerces version 
1.4.3,and, the DOM Paser and SAX Parser can not suppot encoding GBK in Xerces 
version  2.0Beta also,only XNI support encoding GBK in Xerces version  2.0Beta .
We know many chinese character can not view in encoding GB2312,only view in 
encoding GBK.
